about_the_game: Play through the prologue of the game, up until entering the building of Panoptia. Play this demo to understand the overall feel of the game and to get a snippet of how the game's story might progress.
detailed_description: Play through the prologue of the game, up until entering the building of Panoptia. Play this demo to understand the overall feel of the game and to get a snippet of how the game's story might progress.
name: Panoptia Demo
short_description: The prologue of Panoptia, available to try for free.
